short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gives the ability to sort posts on the news.ycombinator.com site by the number of points, time, or comments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing "Hacker News Sorted" â€“ the must-have Chrome extension for every tech person who craves a tailored browsing experience on the iconic news.ycombinator.com! With a dash of magic and a sprinkle of convenience, this nifty tool transforms your Hacker News feed into a fully customizable treasure trove of tech gems.

Ever found yourself sifting through the vast sea of posts, wishing you could snap your fingers and reorder the chaos into a neat list of the highest points, the freshest content, or the most buzzing discussions? "Hacker News Sorted" is here to grant that wish! With just a click, you can sort posts by the number of points, time, or comments, making it a breeze to find the content that matters most to you.

But wait, there's more! I understand that the web doesn't stand still, and neither should your preferences. That's why "Hacker News Sorted" remembers your last selected sort option, setting it as your default for your next visit. It's like having a personal assistant who knows exactly how you like your news served :)

And because I know the best inventions adapt to your needs, my extension is designed to support screen resolutions lower than 1280px by seamlessly shrinking the control panel, ensuring you get the optimal experience on any device.

Dive into the Hacker News community like never before with "Hacker News Sorted" at your fingertips. Tailored to the unique tastes and preferences of tech industry folks, this extension is your ticket to a more enjoyable, efficient, and personalized browsing adventure on Hacker News.

Happy sorting!
